name: Edstellar Solutions
description: Edstellar is a strategic training delivery partner for organizations as an all-in one platform for Instructor-led training, delivered onsite or virtually, for global teams. With an extensive catalog of over 1000 tailored programs across various disciplines (Technical, Behavioural, Functional, Compliance, Leadership and Social Impact). Edstellar simplifies training management through features such as customizable scheduling, trainer selection, HRMS integration, and AI-driven training suggestions. The platform also offers valuable tools like a skill matrix for skill gap analysis, training completion reports, certificate and attendance management, easing the reporting process for L&D teams.
features: Access our network of industry experts
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Instructor-led Managed Training SaaS Platform
ShortDescription: Edstellar is a strategic training delivery partner for organizations as an all-in one platform for Instructor-led training, delivered onsite or virtually, for global teams.
enhanced_description: Edstellar Solutions is an all-in-one, managed SaaS platform designed to be a strategic training delivery partner for organizations. It specializes in Instructor-led training, delivered both onsite and virtually, catering to global teams. The platform offers an extensive catalog of over 1000 tailored programs across various disciplines, including Technical, Behavioural, Functional, Compliance, Leadership, and Social Impact. Edstellar simplifies comprehensive training management with features like customizable scheduling, trainer selection, HRMS integration, and AI-driven training suggestions. As a Corporate LMS and Training Management System, it also provides valuable tools such as a skill matrix for skill gap analysis, training completion reports, and certificate and attendance management, significantly easing the reporting processes for L&D teams and supporting continuous learning and skill development.
key_use_cases: Delivering instructor-led training (onsite and virtual) for global teams
Managing end-to-end training logistics, including scheduling and trainer selection
Identifying and addressing skill gaps through skill matrix analysis
Generating comprehensive training reports (completion, attendance, certificates) for L&D teams
Facilitating continuous learning and skill development initiatives
Managing corporate learning and development programs
Leveraging AI for personalized training suggestions
competitive_advantages: Extensive catalog of over 1000 tailored programs across diverse disciplines
AI-driven training suggestions for personalized learning paths
Access to a network of industry experts for training delivery
All-in-one platform for instructor-led training management
roi_benefits: Accelerated skill development and improved learning efficiency
Simplified and streamlined training management processes
Reduced administrative burden for L&D teams through automated reporting and management
Enhanced training effectiveness through tailored programs and expert delivery
Optimization of learning outcomes through continuous learning focus
